caption:
In spirit of giving back to the community, Chameleon is doing free website performance audit reports for anyone interested! We understand that online presence is more important than ever right now, and getting a checkup is crucial for growth and improvement.  This information can tell you what needs to adjust, if anything, to improve your online presence.

Shoot us a message if you're interested in getting a report and we'll hook you up! 
#givingback #covidresponse #communitysupport

How can you stand out as the economy opens up? Chameleon has the critical resources necesssary to help your company take the next step in marketing, UI/UX, design, and a host of other services for unimpeded growth.

#standout #ourbrandisyou #covid19 #bethechameleon #business #growthmindset

We are excited to announce that we have established our umbrella company Rainforest Collective and are starting a guest based podcast through that.  Chameleon Cast is turning into Canopy Cast, and we have a laundry list of amazing guests booked to come on! @mr.christophermcgurn, @johnmichaelprice, and @mr.michaeljoconnor along with our guests will be covering a variety of topics across industries and disciplines to bring you an ecosystem of expertise!  Go like and follow Canopy Cast to keep up to date and get notified when we launch the first episode next week! You can find us on Instagram @canopy_cast, Facebook, LinkedIn, and YouTube with podcast platforms soon to come!  #podcast #canopycast

With all the turmoil in business today, Chameleon is reaching out to any and all in need. We are offering 25% off our social media services in order to help offset the cost of COVID-19. Reach out today for your free quote!

#covid19 #socialmedia #marketing #business #ourbrandisyou #bethechameleon

Check out our newest blog post on current events and how to help mitigate them in the business world!

Read the full blog post here:
https://www.bethechameleon.com/blog/optimizing-business-in-a-troubling-time
________________________________
#bethechameleon #ourbrandisyou #chameleon #covid19 #coronavirus #blog

The view from our future office!

With everything going on in the world right now, we've been quite busy:

After receiving a large number of requests from clients, we now offer remote-work consulting to help reduce the impact of COVID-19 - all of our standard services are completely operational as well, we will be staying open for any and all of your needs!

Our podcast, Chameleon Cast was canceled this previous week but will be releasing a special episode on current events this Friday - stay tuned!

We are still growing in this concerning time - with new partner and employee announcements coming soon.

We hope that you and yours stay healthy and safe!
________________________________
#chameleon #bethechameleon #ourbrandisyou #coronavirus #remotework #chameleoncast #staysafe #business #denver #colorado

We’re always expanding our team and services - but we're especially looking to add to our rapidly growing tech dev department! Join our team of software engineers, UI/UX designers, web and app developers, and more! Contact us if you think you would make a good chameleon! #beachameleon ?
